mapper.update: UPDATE t_f_maintenance SET accumulatedcompletion = ( SELECT SUM(todayaccomplish) FROM t_s_daystatement WHERE monthscheduleid IN (SELECT `mid` FROM t_month_schedule WHERE fid = (SELECT fid FROM t_month_schedule WHERE `mid` = #{monthscheduleid}))), accumulationcompletionrate = (SELECT SUM(todayaccomplish) FROM t_s_daystatement WHERE monthscheduleid IN (SELECT `mid` FROM t_month_schedule WHERE fid = (SELECT fid FROM t_month_schedule WHERE `mid` = #{monthscheduleid}))) / (workload + changeworkload) WHERE `maintenanceid` = (SELECT fid FROM t_month_schedule WHERE `mid` = #{monthscheduleid} )
